name: Keto Bacon-Wrapped Asparagus with Lemon Aioli
author: fabeveryday
summary: This simple recipe is easy, delicious, and satisfying, especially for those on a ketogenic or low-carb diet. Use full-fat mayonnaise.
directions: Combine mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, garlic, lemon zest, lemon juice, and garlic salt in a bowl and mix well
Refrigerate lemon aioli until ready to use
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Divide asparagus stalks into groups of 3 to 5 stalks, depending on the thickness of the asparagus
Wrap each asparagus bundle tightly with 1 piece of bacon, overlapping slightly as you wrap and tucking the ends under the bacon so it holds securely
Place asparagus bundles in a single layer on a piece of aluminum foil
Spray bundles lightly with olive oil spray and top the bacon with cracked pepper
Grill asparagus bundles on the foil for 10 minutes
Flip each bundle and grill until bacon is cooked through and crisp, an additional 10 minutes
